name: com.mmmaellon.smartobjectsync
description: A drop-in replacement for VRC_ObjectSync that allows for better syncing of objects in VRChat

samples.description: An example scene showing off the capabilities of SmartObjectSync.
A Scene that compares the performance of 1024 VRC_ObjectSync objects to 1024 SmartObjectSyncs

An example scene showing the built-in states written as separate SmartObjectSyncState scripts. In the actual prefab, they are compiled into the main SmartObjectSync.cs script for performance reasons. This example is just for learning how SmartObjectSyncStates work.
